## ProgressBuilderOptions.spring property

Spring animation configuration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
spring?: {
        frequency?: number;
        damping?: number;
    };
```

## Remarks

Controls the spring physics for smooth easing when the progress bar updates. Higher frequency makes the animation faster, higher damping reduces oscillation.
